snippet.title: Petoons Party - Worldwide Release Trailer - 2019
snippet.description:
#petoonsparty #petoons #partygames #playtogether

Ready for a great adventure? The Petoons need your help to face the evil Kitra! 

Petoons Party is a party game full of fun mini-games to enjoy with the family and friends. Play alone or with friends, up to a maximum of 4 simultaneous players.

The game has a very intuitive and easy to handle control system adapted to all ages and combines high quality graphics and very fun animations with a very entertaining shared game experience to unite the whole family playing together.

PETOONS PARTY INCLUDES:

3 Game modes
4 Boards
4 Cups
28 Minigames

Join the Petoons and save their world of magical islands!
----------------------------------------------------------------

FOLLOW US:

* Website: http://www.petoons.com
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/petoons
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/petoons
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/petoons
